overview: Thomas R. Brown brings over 30 years of executive level operational and financial management experience to ATC. Brown has held various senior positions with Sony Electronics, including executive vice president and deputy president of the North American manufacturing operations and, concurrently, president of the Information Technology division. He was also a senior manager of Price Waterhouse (now known as PriceWaterhouseCoopers) and most recently has served as the president of BrownThompson, an executive search firm based in San Diego. Brown has served as a board member for the San Diego Regional Development Corporation, American Glass Video Company and Qualcomm Personal Electronics. He has a bachelor’s degree in economics from Rutgers University and is a certified public accountant.
